name: Cash Blaster - The Pub Fruit Machine Game
name_original: Cash Blaster - The Pub Fruit Machine Game
description:
Cash Blaster LITE is a UK style fruit machine simulator game, just like the ones you would find in your local pub, club or arcade! With one difference, this fruit machine game is purely for fun, and you cannot win or lose real money on it.

The game is based on a Lo-tech style fruit machine commonly found in arcades, public houses, bingo halls and casinos.

Cash Blaster LITE has all of the usual fruit machine features such as holds and nudges, with a few extra cheats thrown in for extra fun such as hold 3 times, holds after nudges and repeat chances!

Any 3 bomb symbols in view will start the win streak feature, where a win will be randomly awarded with a chance to repeat the feature for another win! There are three features to try for, Mixed Streak, Blue Streak and Red Streak! Nudge in 3 Bells to win the virtual jackpot!

The game features two play modes.. You can play a quick game, where you start with 30 credits and you can add more credits from your winnings to keep playing until you run out of virtual cash.

Option two is to play a Leaderboard Game.. Here you are given 30 credits and must try and win a much as possible to climb your way up the leaderboard. You cannot transfer your winnings to credits. At the end of the 30 credits, you are given the opportunity to enter your name into the leaderboard, if you have won enough virtual cash!

Cash Blaster LITE fruit machine game has high resolution graphics, ultra realistic reel technology and great sound effects. The game engine runs exactly like a real fruit machine, and you can even view the internal statistics of the game such as games played, percentage payout, money in and money out!

Remember, Cash Blaster LITE is for entertainment purposes only and no real money can be won or lost.. All of the fun without any of the risk.

If you like fruit machines and slot machines, this is the game for you! How much virtual cash can you win?

Cash Blaster LITE is supported by advertisements, if you like the game and wish to remove the advertisements, the full version can be downloaded from the App Store.
